name: Shamensens Dimensions
description:
A game made for the Lost Relics Games, game jam.

Description: a game about a shaman who wants to go to visit his uncle, but will have to traverse a cave of ghosts to get there.

Lore: You're a shaman named Shamensen, living underground in your hut. One day you want to go to the surface, to see your uncle Jhames, so you practice your connection with the 2 dimensions allowing you to freely travel betwen them, after that you begin your journey.

PS: This is my first ever game jam, so I hope you like the game. There is also a small secret room in the game.

I would also like to know if anybody would be intrested in seeing a full metroidvania game building on top of this one.

FishBlox (Code, art)

Guldblomst10 (Music)
